text: Ruben T. Reyes (3 January 1939 â€“ 13 September 2021) was a Filipino politician and lawyer. He was an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines from 2007 to 2009. He was nominated to the court by President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo. Reyes died on 13 September 2021, aged 82.SC mourns death of ex-justice Ruben Reyes ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Bulacan Category:Filipino judges
title: Ruben Reyes
